homepage.heroSubtitle: We design and develop innovative solutions.

reviews.text: Best thing ever lad like all you do is search something and tada it's there very good for RP.
reviews.author: Hogzz, Nova Designs

reviews.text: Nova designs is amazing, they helped me create my website and run it all for me. All I needed to do was give them a description of what I wanted the website to be about, and some design ideas as well as the name, and boom, I was shown images of it within a day.
reviews.author: Destiny scripts, Nova Designs

homepage.aboutText: Nova Designs is a premier design and development studio focused on delivering high-quality solutions to our clients. Our team of experts specializes in web design, Discord bots, and graphic designs.
homepage.contactText: If you have any questions or need support, feel free to reach out to us on Discord. Click the button below to join our server.
homepage.popupTitle: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
